pr_title: LinkageCheckerTest.testFindLinkageProblems_referenceToJava11Method fails in Java 11 to use Assume Java 8 runtime

timeline.bodyText: Static import of startsWith reads better compared with StringStartsWith.startsWith.
timeline.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: why not use java.lang.String.startsWith()? In not, because that method is much more familiar, this really can't be a static import.
replies.author: elharo

replies.bodyText:
String.startsWith would give a message got false expected true.
This StringStartsWith.startsWith gives more clear message: got: "11.0.4", expected: a string starting with "1.8.0".
replies.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: Fair enough. Static import is still not a good idea here given the confusion with the better known String.startsWith method.
replies.author: elharo
